full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YANG GSANG DKAR PO 'BRUG ZHON LHA LNGA'I SGO NAS DNGOS GRUB BSGRUB TSUL YID BZHIN NOR BU'I DBANG MDZOD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,('DI NAS JO BO RJE MDZAD PA'I BSTOD PA BYIN RLABS CHE BA GRAGS PA YIN NO, ,^BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MA DBEN PA'I GNAS MCHOG BDE CHEN RAB RGYAS GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, KU SHRI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BZOD PA GYIS PA'O,,'DI KYANG 'GRO BA MTHA' DAG DBUL 'PHONGS KYIS SDUG BSNGAL LAS THAR TE, MTHAR THUG DPAL 'BYOR ZAD SHES PA LA LONGS SPYOD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR DZAM GLING BRGYAN DU SHOG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MA,
